attributes.action: force all members of government to divulge membership of ANY societies to which they are a member or have dealings with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to propose the creation of law that would require all those who represent us in government should be open and publish any involvement in ANY society. This is to include not just membership but also knowingly meeting with society members, recieving contributions financially and other contributions. These are to be published in an open forum iather online and in a published and easily accessible document, and direct questions are to be answered truthfully. Any hestitancy or untruthfullness should result in removal from office.
